getting-started.title: Getting Started
getting-started.content: Sign up and get free tokens to start. Choose a model and start generating!

chat.title: AI Chat
chat.content: Use GPT-5, Claude 3, Gemini and other models for text generation, code, analysis and creative tasks.

images.title: Image Generation
images.content: Create unique images with DALL-E 3, Midjourney, Stable Diffusion and other models.

video.title: Video Generation
video.content: Generate videos from text using Google Veo, Sora 2, Kling and other video models.

animate.title: Photo Animation
animate.content: Transform static images into dynamic videos with Runway, Luma Dream Machine and Kling.

api.title: API Documentation
api.content: Integrate AI Generator into your projects via our REST API. Available for Pro and Unlimited plans.

errors.emailTooShort: Email must be at least 3 characters
errors.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 6 characters
errors.passwordWeak: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, and one number
errors.nameTooShort: Name must be at least 2 characters
errors.userExists: User with this email already exists
